      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_e7cfacba3c960679a5c94f0aff507e44c619b155</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ultrasound through fat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ultraschall durch Fett</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ultrasons par la graisse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ultrasound através da gordura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ultrasuono attraverso grasso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπέρηχος μέσω του λίπους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ultrasonido a través de la grasa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the first of two illustrations showing the use of ultrasound to measure the thickness of the fat on a pig's back.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pulse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thickness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultrasound</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist das erste von zwei Abbildungen, die 
den Gebrauch von Ultraschall zeigen, die Stärke des Fettes auf der 
Rückseite eines Schweins zu messen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est le premier de deux illustrations montrant 
l'utilisation des ultrasons de mesurer l'épaisseur de la graisse sur 
le dos d'un porc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o primeiro de duas ilustrações que 
mostram o uso do ultrasound medir a espessura da gordura na parte 
traseira de um porco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è la prima di due illustrazioni che 
mostrano l'uso dell'ultrasuono misurare lo spessore del grasso sulla 
parte posteriore del maiale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η πρώτη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν 
τη χρήση του υπερήχου για να μετρήσει το πάχος του λίπους στην 
πλάτη ενός χοίρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el primer de dos ilustraciones que 
muestran el uso del ultrasonido de medir el espesor de la grasa en la 
parte posteriora de un cerdo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Impuls</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stärke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
